title: Love Island's Iain Stirling reveals the stench of the villa
content:encoded:
It is Love Island launch week, and we could not be more excited to return to the villa! Alex got to chat with Iain Stirling ahead of the show's debut, but you'll have to wait until the end for that clip. First, we've got to get through our bungles of the week - Jane's excited about Pete Evans' bold new hairdo, the truth about Tina from Turners, plus some behind-the-scenes gossip from Tracked, and Duncan's review of the new season of I Think You Should Leave.


Join the Real Pod community!

And here to chat on our Discord server

itunes.author: The Spinoff
itunes.subtitle: The gang discuss everything from Tracked to Tina from Turners. Plus, Alex talks to the narrator of Love Island ahead of the debut of the new season.
